ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > header:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h1

html > body > footer:nth-child(12) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(12) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(12) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > h3:nth-child(1)
